stories.headline: Computer-assisted reporting turns on more TV journalists
stories.summary: Broadcast journalists are increasingly adopting computer-assisted reporting, using online resources and data tools to enhance their storytelling capabilities on-air.

stories.headline: A look at old, decaying dams
stories.summary: Dateline NBC uncovers the risks posed by aging, under-inspected dams across the United States, following a detailed investigation into dam safety.

stories.headline: Radio tunes into CAR
stories.summary: Radio journalists are leveraging computer-assisted reporting for efficient data analysis, facilitating quicker and more insightful reporting on air.
